plot: Akari finds herself nervous coaching a new undine as a Prima, until she awakens to find that it is just a dream. To soothe her worries, Alicia recalls stories of her beginnings as a Prima, as well as the memories she made.
opening_theme: "Nanairo no Sora o (七色の空を)" by SONOROUS
ending_theme: "Ashita, Yuugure Made (明日、夕暮れまで)" by Erino Hazuki
